Job Description:
Software Developer (Java  /  Python )

Location: Pune

Duration: Fulltime

Specific Skills Experience:

2 - 5 years of experience in software development using Java or Python.

Object oriented concepts ,  Multi threading ,  server side development.

Must have great problem solving skills.

Experience in writing REST APIs ,  micro services.

Experience in processing large data ,  parsing.

Working knowledge of Linux is must.

Experience in Storage technologies is big plus.

Primary Responsibilities:

Debug ,  fix bugs and enhance existing code base.

Prepare high level designs from feature requests.

Develop / code of new features based on requirement / design documents.

Perform code reviews of team members.
